thread.title: Cath Wood

author: Cath Wood
title: Cath Wood
text:
Trusted Housesitters is a fabulous organisation. Homeowners need someone trustworthy to look after their home and pets while they're away and Trusted Housesitters does a great job of linking them up with people who love to do that.
I've just had a weekend away looking after a lovely dog. Morning walks on the beach - yes please!
I already have a couple of international house sits organised for this year and am really looking forward to those. What a great way to travel!
